definition: standardized/standard (service, method etc)/regulation (clothing etc)/formulaic/(telecommunications etc) system/format (e.g. the PAL or NTSC systems for TV signals)
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: The checking and accepting standards of Hydrological Data Acquisition System (HDAS) construction vary with its work mode.
sentences.chinese: 水文遥测系统工作制式不同，系统的验收标准也不同。

sentences.english: It's a one man show as players must assist Tiger and face the onslaught of evil troops in this turn-based action game.
sentences.chinese: 你一定要协助老虎在这场回合制式的行动中成功突围。

sentences.english: Structures of multi-standard compatibility and digital filter modules have been optimized.
sentences.chinese: 并对多制式兼容和数字滤波器模块进行了优化。

sentences.english: Goote carry out the small-class teaching and set appropriate format.
sentences.chinese: 教学实行小班授课，定制式教学。

sentences.english: It provides excellent frequency and level control, and wide analog modulation capabilities.
sentences.chinese: 它提供优秀的频率和程度控制，宽模拟制式能力。

sentences.english: PAL's color encoding is similar to the NTSC systems.
sentences.chinese: PAL制式的彩色编码类似NTSC系统系统。

sentences.english: It is NTSC system which suits your country.
sentences.chinese: 这是美国制式，能在贵国使用。

sentences.english: "I didn't like the whole British education at all, " she says.
sentences.chinese: 我完全不喜欢英国的教育制式，它太实际了。

sentences.english: This thesis is concerned with the study of designing multi-modulation scheme software radio receiver.
sentences.chinese: 本文对多制式软件无线电接收机的设计进行了研究。

definition: to issue/to distribute/to publish along with
to copy/to imitate/to make by imitating a model
